name: Classic Midnight Burger
description: A juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, and Midnight sauce on a toasted bun. Topped with crisp lettuce and ripe tomatoes, this burger offers a fresh crunch in every bite. The unique Midnight sauce adds a rich, savory flavor that elevates the entire experience. Served on a toasted bun, this burger is designed to satisfy your cravings and leave you wanting more. Whether you're enjoying a late-night snack or a hearty meal, the Classic Midnight Burger is the perfect choice to delight your taste buds.
ingredients: beef patty, lettuce, tomato, Midnight sauce, bun
